facilities.description: Wheelchair access in to the building, lifts to all floors.
facilities.name: Disabled access

facilities.description:
We have a security arch. Please alert the security officer if you have a pacemaker.
For safety and security, all users and their possessions will be searched by security when they enter the building.
facilities.name: Security arch

facilities.description: Refreshments are available via vending machine
facilities.name: Refreshments

facilities.description: The PSU is available on site to provide assistance.
facilities.name: Witness service

facilities.description: This court has wireless internet access available.
facilities.name: Wireless network connection

facilities.description: Court/hearing room video facilities and prison to court video link facilities are available by prior arrangement. Please contact the court by telephone or email to let us know of your requirements.
facilities.name: Video facilities

facilities.description: The building has hearing enhancement facilities available by prior arrangement. Please contact the Court office by telephone or email if necessary.
facilities.name: Loop Hearing

facilities.description: Baby changing facilities are available in the disabled toilets on the 2nd floor
facilities.name: Baby changing facility
